summary: Chat application with inline link embedding for X posts and YouTube/Twitch videos directly in chat input
architectural_notes: Category tags should be displayed in lowercase across all views including chatrooms
Chat input should detect and preview X post links and YouTube/Twitch video links before sending
Embedded content (X posts, videos) should display inline in the chat message feed

existing_features.title: Remove the separate X post input field and video input field (YouTube/Twitch) from the MessageInput component
Detect X post links (x.com or twitter.com URLs) and YouTube/Twitch video links in the main chat input field and display an inline preview of the embedded content before the user sends the message

Update the message sending logic to detect and extract X post URLs and YouTube/Twitch video URLs from the chat input text and store them in the appropriate mediaType and mediaUrl fields when creating a message

new_feature_requests.summary: Enable inline embedding of X posts and YouTube/Twitch videos by pasting links directly into chat input with preview before sending
Remove separate X post input and video input fields from chatroom page
When a message containing X post links or YouTube/Twitch video links is sent, embed the content inline within the chat message feed using the existing MessageBubble embed rendering logic

projectName: Ensure category tags are lowercase in chatrooms
